ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.summary: Making it easy to query APIs via SQL
Making it easy to query APIs via SQL

name: shillelagh
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "shillelagh" %}
{% set version = "1.4.3" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/shillelagh-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d78b7c8044bb11d4fb926392a495907c34cec71d6e438d5d102e1bfd842c31f7

build:
  noarch: python
  entry_points:
    - shillelagh = shillelagh.console:main
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools >=46.1.0
    - setuptools-scm >=5
    - toml
    - wheel
    - pyscaffold >=3.2a0
    - pip
  run:
    - appdirs >=1.4.4
    - boto3 >=1.24.28
    - botocore
    - defusedxml >=0.7.1
    - holidays >=0.23
    - jsonpath
    - numpy
    - pandas >=1.2.2
    - prison >=0.2.1
    - prompt_toolkit >=3
    - psutil >=5.8.0
    - psycopg2 >=2.9.9
    - pyarrow >=14.0.1
    - pygments >=2.8
    - pyyaml
    - sqlglot >=23.0.2
    - tabulate >=0.8.9
    - typing_extensions >=3.7.4.3
    - yarl >=1.8.1
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - importlib-metadata 
    - apsw >=3.43.2.0
    - python-dateutil >=2.8.1
    - requests >=2.31.0
    - requests-cache >=0.7.1
    - sqlalchemy >=1.3
    - greenlet >=2.0.2
    - typing-extensions >=3.7.4.3
    - packaging 
    # - yarl >=1.8.1
    # - typing_extensions >=3.7.4.3
    # - tabulate >=0.8.9
    # - sqlglot >=23.0.2

test:
  imports:
    - shillelagh
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/betodealmeida/shillelagh/
  summary: Making it easy to query APIs via SQL
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.txt

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - rxm7706
